Other facilities such as evaporative cooling, ducted heating, less maintenance and much more. This home will be a great asset for either investor or family.
Located in Clydevale estate, close to Shopping Centers, schools and others, this will be a good home for either family or investor.
Call Emily at 0413 219 339 today and make appointment to inspect the property!

Description:
Perfect Family Home
Its not everyday you come across a place to call home that has all this home has to offer, quality finishes and a great location and space for all the family. Formal lounge great for all the movie nights. Through to the family living zone, with a spacious hostess kitchen. Boasting an upright 900ml gas cooktop /oven, stone benches, under bench microwave cavity, a very generous walk in pantry and lots of bench and cupboard space. Downstairs is serviced by the central powder room.
Double door access with security doors to the alfresco area that overlooks the spacious backyard. Perfect for the children to play and with space to put a trampoline and swing set. Upstairs you'll find 4 generous sized bedrooms all with double built in robes. Master has a large WIR and ensuite with his and hers basins. There is internal access from the remote control double garage. Perfectly positioned close to schools, shops, there is a park across the road and you can enjoy the view from the balcony too with local sporting facilities close by. Be quick, homes this nice don't usually last long!
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
PORTER DAVIS LUXURY EX DISPLAY
Blessed with a stunning exterior of designer brickwork, render and timber the street appeal is just the start of what this Porter Davis ex display has to offer. Making the most of the living space a separate living/study area is located at the front of the home for quiet enjoyment. Two bedrooms both with built-in-robes are conveniently situated close to the family bathroom and separate toilet. A brilliant design provides internal access from double garage and an open plan living area with a beautifully appointed and stylish stone benchtop kitchen with built in pantry overlooking the rear entertainment alfresco area. A seperate rumpus/TV room at the rear with perfectly landscaped low maintenance backyard seamlessly connecting. Another highlight of this home is the spacious and private master suite with walk in robe and full ensuiite which also has its own glass sliding door to the outdoor area. Features include stunning timber flooring and decking, gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling. You will enjoy living opposite parkland amongst other quality display homes in beautiful Highgove Estate. Don't miss this opportunity. Call now for more information!
Call Vincent and Sandra today for your free no obligation market appraisal 5678 8506

Description:
DROP DEAD GORGEOUS
Situated within the ever-popular Berwick Waters estate is this stunning four bedroom home.The moment you walk in the front door, you know this home is something special. The wow factor hits you right away, being greeted with large 2.7m ceilings that lead you to huge vaulted ceilings in the contemporary main living area and kitchen.Styled to perfection, the central living area comprises an oversized lounge and meals zone, which overlooks the decked outdoor alfresco making it the perfect setting for seamless indoor/outdoor entertaining all year round. The impressive kitchen features stone benchtops, glass splashback, 900mm cooktop and oven, dishwasher, pot drawers, plenty of storage/bench space and a huge walk in pantry with extra storage.The master retreat is over sized with its own air-conditioner, his and hers walk in robes and ensuite with twin vanities and oversized shower with waterfall shower head.The second/third bedrooms are of generous size, with built in robes. The fourth bedroom doubles as a theatre room/second living area and has been completely fitted out with all the wiring needed for a home theatre system. Other features include: walk in linen cupboard in laundry, luxurious sheer curtains and block out blinds/curtains, air conditioning, ducted heating, low maintenance gardens, grassed backyard for the kids/pets to play in and so much more that deserves your inspection. You would be proud to invite anyone over if you were lucky enough to own this gorgeous home, so don't waste any time making it yours today.Nearby amenities include: - Schools: St Catherines PS, St Francis Xavier College, Berwick Chase PS, Hillcrest Christian College - Shops: Eden Rise Village- Berwick train station- Monash freeway

Description:
TITLED LAND - Opportunity Awaits!
THIS LAND IS TITLED AND READY TO BUILD NOW!!!
Ideally located in the most popular "Meridian Estate", offering a highly asked for 14-meter frontage - perfect! Will be ready soon to build a home to fit the entire family or offers great investment potential given its highly sought after location.
- 14m frontage & 32m depth
- Walking distance to Proposed Primary School
- Less than 5 minutes' drive to The Avenue Shopping Centre
- Short proximity to Monash Freeway & Casey Hospital
- Close to Berwick & Merinda Park Train Stations
- No Easement
Drive to Meriden Land Sales Office – Brown Projects (type in google maps)
Turn into Stature Avenue off Thompson Road all the way to the end.
→ Then turn Right down NEWGRANGE BLVD
← Then turn Left onto KAKADU ST
→ Then turn Right onto FUJI ST
The block will be located on your right hand side, Marked out with stakes painted pink outlining the block with a sign LOT 712.

Description:
Smart start - perfect for first home buyers
Found in the popular Highgrove estate and offering you convenient modern family living, this pristine Metricon built four bedroom home is sure to impress. Just meters away from fantastic park facilities this property would be perfect for the growing family or even the savvy investor.
Features include:
- Four generous bedrooms all with built in robes – Master with en-suite, larger shower and walk in robe.
- Open plan living including kitchen and meals space.
- Beautiful kitchen includes 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, plus 40mm Ceaser stone benchtop, pot draws, a walk in pantry and breakfast bar.
- Outdoor undercover alfresco for entertaining as well as secure backyard.
- Separate toilet.
- Walk in linen cupboard.
- Extra features include: Ducted heating, double lock up garage with internal access, LED downlights throughout, 2.7m ceilings, plus much more.
As one of the fastest growing suburbs in Melbourne this home offers its new owners a world of opportunity. Highgrove estate has been designed with family and community living in mind with multiple parklands and avenues linking neighborhoods AND is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. Lush parks and open spaces make family time a breeze plus there is easy access to Shopping on Clyde, schools such as Clyde Primary, sports and recreation facilities– it's got it all!
Don't miss and inspect today!

Description:
BRAND NEW EXQUISITE STYLE
A showcase of exquisite style, this cutting-edge brand-new residence encourages a low-maintenance family lifestyle with its crisp contemporary layout and sensational setting in a newly developed estate. This beautifully detailed home unfolds seamlessly right from the entry with stunning floorboards flowing past a formal lounge room awash with glorious natural light and high ceilings. Whilst the home's appealing orientation allows northerly sunshine to filter throughout the open plan kitchen, family and meals area, embellished with stone benches, stainless steel 900mm appliances and dishwasher, walk-in pantry plus an island breakfast bench. Glass sliding doors present a free-flowing connection with the low-maintenance garden surrounds making it perfect for those with young children or pets. Maintaining pride of place at the front of the home, the master bedroom boasts a walk-in-robe and ensuite with stone vanity, whilst the three children's bedrooms include built-in-robes, one with access through to the accompanying family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Quality appointments showcase ducted heating, evaporative cooling, exposed aggregate driveway plus a double garage with internal access. Setting a new standard in quality lifestyle design, near Nossal High School, Berwick Chase Primary, Hillcrest College, Kambrya College, Eden Rise Shopping Centre, parkland plus the M1 Freeway.
(PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTION)
Goldbank Team welcomes you and looks forward to meeting you at the opens.

http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Opportunity knocks!
This brand new property is conveniently Located within the walking distance from Hillcrest and Rivercrest college, parks and close to the local shopping centres, quality schools, Chisholm TAFE, Federation university, both public and private hospitals, local child care centres, Monash freeway access
The property features:
- 3 bedrooms, master with full en-suite and WIR
- Spacious kitchen with gas appliances and walk in pantry
- Open plan dining and living area
- Lock up garage with internal and remote access

Description:
TITLED CORNER BLOCK - 508sqr
Situated in the ever popular Meridian Estate, this massive titled 508m2 land with a huge 16m frontage will allow you to build the dream home you have been waiting for!
Imagine this 508m2 Titled Block land in a master planned neighbourhood created with genuine community in mind, a blend of stylish homes and tree-lined streets. Your life here will revolve around local wetlands, vast open spaces, shady parks brim full of places to play, picnic, stroll, exercise and meet up while enjoying panoramic views all woven together with cycling and pedestrian paths.
Located only moments from an abundance of local amenity, minutes from the
township of Berwick and easy access to Melbourne CBD via Monash Highway or South Gippsland Highway makes this land ideal if you want to invest or build your dream home on.
Some schools such as Clyde Primary School, Lighthouse Christian College, Cranbourne East Primary and Secondary schools are all within 5 kms of this estate.

Located in the prestige Ramleigh Springs estate, from the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. Vibrant and captivating, this cleverly designed home delivers a practical and flexible living floorplan for the whole family. You will love to come home to this contemporary and luxurious home with its high ceilings, giving you a warm and inviting atmosphere. The residence boasts open plan living, dining and kitchen space, which all flow together effortlessly onto the Alfresco area and backyard ready to create your dream.
Accommodation includes four generous bedrooms, the master suite with large ensuite and walk in robe, and three secondary bedrooms with built in robes. The centrepiece of the home is the Kitchen, meals and living area. With stone benchtops, stainless appliances and butler's pantry, perfect for the growing family to entertain and enjoy.
Creature comforts include gas ducted heating, double car garage and all wrapped up on a 544m2 (approx.) block of land. This is your opportunity to secure a slice of paradise, so call now to make your appointment.

Description:
BRAND NEW GORGEOUS FAMILY HOME!! (CLYDEVALE ESTATE)
Located in Clydevale Estate
TAKE FUTHER $10,000 OFF FROM YOUR OFFER-ELIGIBLE TO FHOG (FIRST HOME OWNERS GRANT).
A showcase of modern style home is generously sized with the master bedroom having adjoining en-suite and walk-in-robe.
Both other generous sized bedrooms come with added built-in-robes along with the central bathroom and separate toilet being located in between the rooms.
This beautiful home comes with a fully equipped modern quality kitchen added with a bonus walk-in pantry, which includes a stainless steel 900mm cook top and 900mm oven, dishwasher and range-hood. The quality stone bench top , landscape of the backyard that has very low-maintenance.
The backyard has access to natural gas and water connections at the rear of the home, which is ideal for entertaining, and possible plans for an outside kitchen or BBQ area.
This location is also avaliable for the NBN.
Further features Include:
- Master-bedroom with Ensuite and walk in robe
- Quality Kitchen with Stone bench tops and Bonus Walk in Pantry
- 900mm Range-hood & Cooktop and Dishwasher Appliances to Kitchen
- Modern bathrooms with quality Caesar stone bench tops.
- Double Garage with internal access
Located in the heart of newly developed Clydevale Estate.
- 1.2ha park, with playground, basketball key, BBQs' and sun shelter
- The estate is traversed by more than 4ha of picturesque wetlands, reserves and a waterway bringing nature and wildlife to the heart of the project
- live within walking distance of the new Town Centre and close to established amenities including excellent schools and tertiary education institutes, shopping, Casey Fields sporting facilities and train station
- Short walk from house to Clydevale Park (Located in Clydevale Estate) Where you can enjoy Chlildren play area, BBQ, family gathering, walking tracks.
For private inspection or any enquiries feel free to contact us anytime.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL LIVING IN A BRAND NEW HOME !! READY BUILD !!
Combining modern design influences with clever detail this architecturally designed home offers generous light filled living spaces and a private and peaceful environment in this exclusive cul-de-sac location in a estate that will soon be THE PLACE TO BE IN CLYDE NORTH !
Cleverly executed to create a private sanctuary, the home’s masterful use of the land sees every principal room extend to a series of courtyard garden retreats. 600X600 porcelain glazed tiled flooring, clever placement of windows and intelligent use of open and private spaces add to the home’s calm beauty and understated elegance.
The 2.7 M high ceilings that feature all through out the home, enhancing the feeling of space and light. Luxurious tiled flooring that continues onto the open living and dining area shout class from every angel.
The master piece of this home is the Kitchen, designed to bring out the chef inside you, equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, a five burner free standing cooktop oven,900mm range hood and 600mm dishwasher, wood look tile splash back and finally to top it all off 40mm stone benches & a large walk in pantry with a outstanding amount of space & refrigerator space. All this slide open to a serene courtyard garden with providing a Zen like feeling while preparing meals. This along with a large walk in pantry with an unreliable amount of space and so much more to spare!!
The focal point of this residence is its open plan informal living, dining and kitchen space, which all flow together effortlessly onto the Backyard area. You will not only be investing on this distinguished location, but also a flawless, and pristine design.
This home is brimming with features, including:
• Four bedrooms, all with built in robes plus the third bedroom that comes with double doors so can be used as a theater.
• Master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity, ceaserstone benchtop and large showers
• Two separate living areas conveniently positioned around the home include a middle formal living, family room adjacent to kitchen and dining.
• Modern kitchen features a 40mm caesarstone island benchtop, 900mm upright cooker and oven, dishwasher, clear glass splashback and walk-in-pantry
• Zoned ducted heating, and LED downlights throughout
• Landscaping, fencing and driveways all included !!
• Remote controlled lock up garage with internal access
Built by the award winning custom builder , this master piece is a rare opportunity to own a piece of the Ramblegh Springs Estate, a community unlike any other with a distinct village feel, this brand new home gives buyers and investors an opportunity to purchase this stunning home with immaculate style without having to go to the trouble of building !!
BRAND PROPERTY IS FULLY COMPLETED AND READY TO MOVE IN !!
- 4 HOMES AVAILABLE , DIFFERENT COLOURS ALL ON OFFER !!
- FIRST HOME BUYERS YOU CAN GET GOVERNMENT GRANT
- SECOND HOME BUYERS YOU CAN SAVE ON STAMP DUTY
- INVESTORS YOU ONLY WILL HAVE TO PAY 5% DEPOSIT AND REST AT SETTLEMENT

Description:
Beautiful family home in highly sought after location
Gorgeous family home boasting fine detailing and natural décor throughout. Perfect for first home buyers and growing families.
Comprising of:
- 4 bedrooms, master fit with walk in robe and stunning ensuite. Other 3 generously sized bedrooms all with double built in robes
- Front living perfect for a rumpus room or formal dining
- Open plan kitchen complete with Zampetti Oven & dishwasher, overlooking the second living & dining area
- Outside you will find a gorgeous undercover, decked Alfresco complimented by an outdoor ceiling fan. Perfect for those warm summer days.
- Extra features include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, double lock up garage, alarm system as well as cctv camera perimitering the home for that extra security.
Being in a prime location close to schools, shopping centers and all local sporting facilities there’s simply no need to look any further. Be quick because a property such as this one won’t be around for long!! Contact Matt Dewan on 0416 638 019 or Brent Day on 0421 085 092 today to book an inspection.

Description:
Ex-Display Home Ready to Move in
built on a large block of land, this elegant home offers spacious master bedroom with walkin robes & ensuite, separate front living space, designer kitchen with waterfall island benchtop with under-mount double bowl sink, under-mount fiver burner cooktop and oven, walkin pantry, open plan kitchen & living space with stacker doors to the alfresco, three more spacious bedrooms with ample wardrobe spaces, separate study nook and display landscaping front & back
With large side access to backyard with wide driveway, this is an ideal home for your boat, trailer or the caravan.
For your convenience, this home comes with
- Display landscaping front and back
- 2700mm HIgh Ceilings
- Refrigerated Heating & cooling
- Two living zones
- Downlights throughout
- Floor to ceiling tiles in Ensuite and Bathroom
- Free standing tub in bathrom
- Walkin pantry
- Marble/Stone benchtops in ensuite, bathroom & kitchen
- Pendent lights over island benchtop
- Quality floating boards in entry, hallway, kitchen, meals & living
- Quality carpets in second living, master and bedrooms
- Alarm system
Your new home is located walking distance from
- Selandra Rise Shopping centre
- Selandra Rise primary School
- Childcare centre
- Bus stop
- Waterfront
and a short drive from
- St Peters Secondary School
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- Berwick Chase Primary School
- kambrya college
- Brentwood Park Primary School
- Nossal High School
- Chisholm Institute
- St Margaret's School Berwick
- Monash Freeway
- Berwick Railway station
- Berwick Hospital
- Edenrise shopping centre
- Avenue Shopping centre
- Berwick Town Centre
- Cranbourne Town Centre
and many more conveniences

CALL IT HOME AT PRESTIGIOUS BERWICK WATERS!! READY TO MOVE IN!!
Come home to this contemporary home with many luxurious inclusions throughout such as its high ceilings, convenient floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere. With its well designed open plan informal living, dining and kitchen space this properly represents an immaculate example of a modern property.
As you enter the living area of this property, its spacious kitchen with numerous quality inclusions such as 40mm Caesarstone island benchtop, 900mm upright cooker, 900mm oven and dishwasher is the highlight of this property. Planning of this stunning home provides various storage spaces, BIR and more to spare!
Inclusive of features such as:
- Four bedrooms, all inclusive of built in robes.
- Master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite with Caesarstone
benchtop
- The modern kitchen features a 40mm Caesarstone island benchtop,
900mm upright cooker, 900mm oven and dishwasher
- Ducted heating, and LED downlights throughout
- Remote controlled lock up garage with internal access
- Landscaping, fencing, and driveways all included!!
Owning this stunning house is a great opportunity for you to call home within a well established and convenient location in Berwick Waters!
Why hassle with builders when you can walk right into your very own brand new Turnkey package home! where no expense was spared in the construction of this beautiful and well designed home.
Be the FIRST to inspect this beautiful property as you will be spoilt for choice with TWO similar properties to choose from!
READY FOR YOU TO MOVE IN ASAP!!
CALL TO BOOK AN APPOINTMENT!!!
